Docs.summary: Represents a reference to a local variable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeVariableReferenceExpression can be used to represent a reference to a local variable.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableReferenceExpression.VariableName%2A> property specifies the name of the local variable to reference.
Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression> to reference a field. Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression> to reference a property. Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression> to reference an event.
